name: Splodge Royale
description:
From the maker of Zombie Death Quota.
Use Gyro Aim to Paint and Power Slide your way around while defeating Monsters, building platforms and avoiding the deadly Squog (Square Fog).
Multiple game modes to test your skill in paint coverage, speed and aim.

Key Features


  • 6 different Paint Splodgers.
  • Lots of Power Ups and items.
  • Single Player and up to 4 Local Players for Co-op and Versus.

Game Modes


  • Splodge Royale: Paint more of the world than your friends, as the fog closes in.
  • Battle Royale: Hide or fight as the fog closes in.
  • KingZone: Find and paint the Zones.
  • Charged: Battle between points to transfer energy.
  • Passport: Collect enough gold and evacuate before your friends do, place traps to slow them down.
  • Overpaint: Repaint enough of the old paint.
  • Skate: Collect enough gold before the time runs out.
  • Storm Race: Avoid the fast moving fog.
  • Survival Race: Avoid the fog and defeat monsters.
  • Collect and Conquer: Defeat monsters and collect gold.
